__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[VincentLegout]]</nowiki>
* Make: ASUS
* Model: A6Km
* Website: http://www.asus.com/products4.aspx?l1=5&l2=24&l3=0&model=794&modelmenu=1

=== Current Issues ===

Boot hangs on ''ACPI: Setting ELCR to 0200 (from 0c30)'' if an USB mouse is connected. This is caused by a BIOS bug. Use a patched ACPI DSDT from http://acpi.sourceforge.net/dsdt/index.php to work around this problem. Downgrading to BIOS release 0202AS is also reported to work.

The Webcam (D-MAX / Syntek Semicon, 174f:a311) does not work (no drivers). A Linux driver is in development at http://syntekdriver.sourceforge.net/.

On Edgy an error message with the text "Internal error. Failed to initialize HAL!" is displayed on login (bug <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/bugs/62990|#62990]]</nowiki>). On a related problem, suspend and hibernate functions do not work.

==== Notes ====
[1] In Windows this key switches between power management profiles defined in ASUS Power4 Gear program. In Ubuntu it activates the screen saver.
* ''Please file a bug https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/hotkey-setup/+filebug along with your `dmidecode` output so that we can identify your laptop and change what this key is mapped to.
* This is reported as bug <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/bugs/35791|#35791]]</nowiki>.

[2] In Ubuntu this opens the CD-tray.
